file_content.text: Good luck down there. I'll do my best to keep Malgus's forces off your back.
Destroy the traitor's army. I'll cover you from the sky.
The Imps are gunning for Malgus, too. Still, I'd keep an eye on them.
We may share an enemy with the Republic, but that doesn't mean you should trust them.
Looks like Malgus is true to his word. He's got alien friends all over the trenches.
The trenches look like an alien shooting gallery from up here. They're fools to support Malgus.
Woohoo! Malgus's forces are on the run!
Excellent work! Enemy forces dispersing.
Head into the mines. It's the only way inside Fort Barrow.
The mines will take you straight to Fort Barrow.
Enemy chatter's saying Darth Malgus's right-hand man is approaching Ilum. Be careful.
Enemy comm channels are lighting up. Apparently Darth Malgus's right hand is approaching Ilum.
Blast! The base is shielded. Knock out the generators, and we'll cause some damage.
We can't breach the shields! Disable their generators, and we'll come in heavy.
Shields are down! Repeat, the base's shields are down! Coming in for a bombing run!
Good work. Their shields are down. Bombing run on my mark.
Bombs away!
Target locked. Missiles away!
I'm tracking a stealth commander fighter. He just took out an Imperial attack wing by himself.
Blast, lost him! He's headed for the base. A thousand credits says that's Malgus's right-hand man.
Careful down there.
A stealth fighter's tracking me. No... it's a command ship!
He's skilled. Somebody get this scum off--argh!
Shields out. Engines--blast! I'm going down! I'm going--!
